website_summaries.verdict: The best value. They provide similar protection and comfort as other models for a fraction of the price.
pros: Flow-Tech ventilation provides ideal air flow and fog control
Foam padding and thick, adjustable strap ensures extra comfort
cons: These goggles are large and might not fit individuals with small faces

customer_reviews.title: I love them! Best price for the nice design
customer_reviews.text: I love them ! Best price for the nice design
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, good clarity
customer_reviews.text: I got the Vermillion lenses as recommended by another reviewer. The conditions I skied in were very sunny, and while I squinted a little bit on the lift, the lens were perfect on the runs. I have an XS head (motorcycle helmet size) and these fit me very comfortably, no slipping. The foam is comfortable, and the lens didn't fog (but the weather was only in the 30s-40s) I'll update my review after I've used these more, but so far I'm extremely satisfied; I've never skied with goggles before and I am a convert.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Just read carefully about the color you need, it depends of the activity. I bought the goggles with vermillon lens, because I will use them in daytime, in snow and ice enviroments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well for my first ski trip to Breckinridge! The only thing I didn't like is that they kept fogging up when I was skiing at the top, but then I realized it was the way I had my scarf positioned over them, it was sending the moisture from my mouth to the goggles! Overall, they work well and I'm really happy with them! Especially for the price! Great for bright, white snow!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Top Contributor: Swimming

customer_reviews.title: Quality Goggles
customer_reviews.text: As far as I'm concerned, red lenses are a must when it comes to snowboarding (you're able to distinguish changes in terrain easier). I bought the Vermillon and although they're a tad on the pink side, I'm still satisfied. They run a bit small but I would think one could wear regular sized glasses underneath. I'm surprised the description hasn't been updated to better explain the exposure ratings, but I've worn these on days that featured plenty of sun and didn't have much issue. Bolle is a quality company that makes quality products. You'll probably see a similar pair on Alex Pullin this weekend at the X Games Aspen.
customer_reviews.author: The Neon Gentleman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect goggles for skiing/boarding
customer_reviews.text: Perfect goggles for skiing/boarding. It's been pretty cold this winter, and I have been very comfortable wearing these goggles. They look nice and provide just enough protection from sun glare. My kids say I have the best goggles and want a pair too!
customer_reviews.author: DSteal

customer_reviews.title: Fogged up too much.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my very small 13 year old daughter.Ended up buying a different brand from somewhere local plus a helmet to match because these ones fogged up bad.
customer_reviews.author: BobChuck

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget Goggles
customer_reviews.text: These worked amazingly for our trip to Vermont. They handle very good in most light conditions, although they are much better in bright days. At the end of the day when the sun is coming down they perform okay but are much better earlier. No fogging, very comfortable overall.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!  Just as Described
customer_reviews.text: Product exactly as described. They are ideal for small faces. Crystal clear. They do NOT fog up. They do have a tinge, but as the clarity is excellent, this is not an issue for me. Very comfortable to wear and easy to adjust size to fit one's face perfectly I also have Bolle sunglasses. Their products are high quality
customer_reviews.author: Northern Virginia

customer_reviews.title: The best Goggles! We were at a very high altitude ...
customer_reviews.text: The best Goggles! We were at a very high altitude and the sun was shining down so bright on us yet these never fogged up, and made my view glare-free! Thry are very comfortable too! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in product. Tried to use in snow but got fogged up, then ice formed and when I tried to scrap off ice it scratched the lens and was unable to use. I really need them to work since I was skiing already. Only reason for a 3 was because my son's pair worked. No fog or issue.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles. We used for skiing in PA
customer_reviews.text: Great goggles. We used for skiing in PA. No fogging, very comfortable. We bought vermillion colored lense, they were perfect for skiing during sunny day and in the evening
customer_reviews.author: Lena Kali

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lenses For Kids & Beginners
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 11-year old daughter for her inaugural ski trip. She loved them - we loved the price. They felt substantial and served their purpose. These are single-lense only (which I would expect for this awesome price) and do not include a yellow lens for night skiing or storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: ITP4ME

customer_reviews.title: These goggle fit well, even with a helmet. ...
customer_reviews.text: These goggle fit well, even with a helmet. I ordered both black and white, but am returning the white ones because my sister already has a pair. We plan to find out if the anti-fog feature works in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: BamaGirl

customer_reviews.title: ... not even come with a cloth case which is pretty cheap and lame
customer_reviews.text: These are decent for the low cost but they do not even come with a cloth case which is pretty cheap and lame. They should come with a case at least!!!! Also they do not fit over other eye glasses well. Smaller fit. Good for night skiing though.
customer_reviews.author: ZanyforLife

customer_reviews.title: A++++
customer_reviews.text: These goggles have been fantastic while skiing, whether it's sunny or cloudy I can see perfectly. They've only fogged up on me twice right after getting off the lift, but the vents on the top cleared it right up. Comfortable and good quality for the price! I got the vermillion lens based off other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely pleased with quality and the price is a fraction of ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely pleased with quality and the price is a fraction of what you would expect to pay at a local store. If you are doing some heavy duty snowboarding or skiing then you will want to consider getting double lens goggles. We got 2 pairs of these in addition to double lens goggles. Pay attention to the suggested color for sunny days (yellow or red) and get clear if you expect to be using them at night!
customer_reviews.author: PH

customer_reviews.title: ... to go snowboarding and these googles have been very comfortable. I haven't had any issues with them fogging ...
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these twice this snow season to go snowboarding and these googles have been very comfortable. I haven't had any issues with them fogging up. For the most part, I'm able to see clearly. However, when snowfall is a bit heavier it does still get difficult to see - but I have yet to find a pair of googles that can combat snowstorm visibility (if one even exists). For the price, you can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed! Comfort and durability that come in a reasonably priced goggles.
customer_reviews.author: il girl

customer_reviews.title: They fit fine and true to the colors described
customer_reviews.text: True to information posted but it's adjustable and that doesn't stay when you adjust it. I would have sent them back to see if that was defective but my 11yr old was going snowboarding. They fit fine and true to the colors described.
customer_reviews.author: Jdesign

customer_reviews.title: Worked in a blizzard.
customer_reviews.text: I used it and shoveled snow in a new england blizzard. It was night time shoveling. My eyes were protected from the wind and snow. Didnt fog up and didnt reduce nighttime visibility at all. Very useful on and off snow resort.
customer_reviews.author: S N

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and love the shade of the lens - really brightens up the day
customer_reviews.author: BnD Williams

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Fog-free, easy to use, and overall pretty comfortable. Only 4 stars... both my husband and I bought a pair and by the end of the week with them, we both confessed that the nose bridge pressed on our nostrils a bit more than we would have liked. With an already stuffy nose it seemed to aggravate us, but not be something too detrimental.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Happy with purchase. Bought for whole family. Only issue was they pushed down too much onto nose when wearing ski helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 😎 Coolness Personified
customer_reviews.text: Whether skiing or using the snowblower, these goggles are beautiful and functional. No fog vents, adjustable strap, UV protection, blue blocker, comfortable foam face cushion.
customer_reviews.author: S. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Might recommend something nicer for a big
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for my ski trip. Might recommend something nicer for a big skier
customer_reviews.author: spoolman17

customer_reviews.title: I love these goggles!
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are the best you can get for the price range! They are very clean, and withstand the punishment that a day or 2 of skiing can dish out. The strap is very comfortable and they fit over my face like they were made just for me. I love them, now I just need some snow...
customer_reviews.author: Pete Paul

customer_reviews.title: A little on the narrow side
customer_reviews.text: Seem like pretty decent goggles, especially for the money. Unfortunately, I ended up giving them to my wife as they were slightly narrow for my face.
customer_reviews.author: BryanJ

customer_reviews.title: The goggles fit really good and I loved the style
customer_reviews.text: The goggles fit really good and I loved the style. They work really well when it is bright and sunny, however the shade of the color (Vermillon) makes it really hard to see the snow properly when you are skiing in the shade or in the afternoon when the sun isn't directly over your path.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Goggles
customer_reviews.text: These goggles were great! The only thing I may say against them was the plastic piece to adjust the size was beginning to hurt my head toward the end of the day. That was probably just because I was not used to them or maybe had them a bit too tight. Overall they were great and I will use them again!
customer_reviews.author: catlvr

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect googles- no fogging- great glare reduction- comfy fit over or under helmet. And the price is perfect. Also felt comfy on my face- not HUGE like some others. Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Bethysue332

customer_reviews.title: I don't see much variation on the slopes when it's a sunny day but in general I am very pleased with this purchase especially fo
customer_reviews.text: They don't fog over, keep me warm. I don't see much variation on the slopes when it's a sunny day but in general I am very pleased with this purchase especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: awesome goggles.
customer_reviews.text: used these in Colorado in the snow, amazing goggles. Blocked the sun and still allowed us to view amazing sights during heavy snow fall.
customer_reviews.author: retail therapy

customer_reviews.title: and were comfortable for both a small head and a larger head
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs for my boyfriend and I for a ski trip. I can't speak to longevity because we do not snowboard regularly as we live in Florida but the clarity that the red lenses gave us was impressive, they packed well, and were comfortable for both a small head and a larger head, and did not fog. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MRL

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for what i needed it for. Now I just need contacts when I wear these. Accommodates my glasses OK.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Salazar

customer_reviews.title: 100x better than my Oakley Goggles.
customer_reviews.text: These were great. I had a pair of Oakleys that I could not see any variation in the snow at a close range and would hit a lot of unexpected bumps. With these I could see everything clearly. Very good for the price and would certainly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality and doesn't fit my flat face that well
customer_reviews.text: Not great quality and doesn't fit my flat face that well. For the price, who cares. It's a throw away piece, better than renting someone's nasty goggles.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lui

customer_reviews.title: Bad opening experience
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the original packaging, I have opened it in the past, I can't see the instructions, etc., just a pair of glasses is inside, and the box is opened.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love these - but after quite someone my eyes did ...
customer_reviews.text: love these - but after quite someone my eyes did get a little watery from the glare - these would be perfect for cloudy weather as stated.
customer_reviews.author: Geanne

customer_reviews.title: These look huge on me. For the price, ...
customer_reviews.text: These look huge on me. For the price, though, I can't complain. I guess the silver lining is that since they were so big, they fit over my glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Egun on!

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles, would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They're adorable and functional! They shielded my eyes on the slopes from the sun, cold wind from skiing down a mountain, and fresh powder flying everywhere. They fogged up once because my gaiter was tucked into them. Once I pulled the gaiter down a little they didn't fog up anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great first goggles
customer_reviews.text: These worked great snowboarding and skiing in CO. They were perfect during the day in sunny conditions, however I did not have the chance to use them in cloudy or dark conditions so I cant rate them in that aspect. If you are wearing a helmet with these they might put some pressure on your nose, which makes breathing a little more difficult but not impossible, I didn't have a problem with it although others might. Overall, these were a great first pair of goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vermillion lense is the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, great quality and the color is spectacular! I really see why people like to look through the world with "rose colored glasses" because the tint on these googles is VERY pleasing and easy on the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: cocade27

customer_reviews.title: she said they were even better in person than the
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves them. she said they were even better in person than the pic
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: I like them a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like them a lot. They do as intended and no fogging issues as was feared. Any smaller though and they wouldn't have fit. I have a biggish head though so i am sure most people will find them perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Allen

customer_reviews.title: BEST BUY EVER!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, but I had to say how awesome these goggles are. I wore them in a variety of weathers and I was so beyond pleased. No fogging at all and the Vermillion lens gave perfect clarity to snow like I have never seen before.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Not great for flat light conditions
customer_reviews.text: Decent goggles for the price. Not great for flat light conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Honey West

customer_reviews.title: Excellent goggles!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent goggles! Clear vision and did not fog over on the Pennsylvania slopes last month!
customer_reviews.author: dia

customer_reviews.title: Lens color good in most settings - not too dark or light
customer_reviews.text: Lens color good in most settings - not too dark or light. Seems to push down on my nose otherwise comfort good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: look nice next to her white helmet
customer_reviews.text: Daughter likes them. stylish, look nice next to her white helmet. She wished the rose was a little lighter, for night use, so we didn't have to buy so many pairs...
customer_reviews.author: R. A.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the frame is too small and there is no proper nosing cushion...
customer_reviews.author: California Hotel

customer_reviews.title: Love these goggles.
customer_reviews.text: I use these to hike in really cold weather and they don't fog up outside.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah0218

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles
customer_reviews.text: Really great goggles. Especially for this price. Lens color is good in most weather, best in sun. Excellent seal to face.
customer_reviews.author: RHunt

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Great goggles and make you look good with the colored cristal.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Warm and very little fogging.
customer_reviews.text: I live in Barrow Alaska and use these to keep my eyes from freezing in really cold days and they do really well at keeping me warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Used them all day in Vermont. Fantastic price
customer_reviews.author: AmyintheAtl

customer_reviews.title: Great all-around goggle for the mountain
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our daughter. We ski/board at night often, but start late afternoons, so this shade of lens works well.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Ski Googles
customer_reviews.text: These are nice ski goggles but they are rather large for my face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice pair of kids glasses. Sporty and stood up to my 12yo.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

customer_reviews.title: Nice fitting goggle
customer_reviews.text: These goggels fit snuggly around the face, they don't let moisture in. They also adjust wide enough to fit around helmets. They have yet to fog up and still remain in excellent condition after several wears.
customer_reviews.author: waitykaty

customer_reviews.title: Nice value!
customer_reviews.text: These work great! We went into resort to look at goggles with one of our friends--every option there was $50+!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Superior Glare Reduction
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product quality, especially for the price. Comfortability and glare reduction are superior.
customer_reviews.author: John Hall

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Just skiied with these babies up in the New Hampshire snow this past weekend, worked like a charm with no fogging even with my gator tucked under the bottom lip. Quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Nina F

customer_reviews.title: I love the color and it fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for my first time boarding, I love the color and it fit perfectly. Besides it not being that suitable for stormy weathers and ice sticking to the outside, the visual was nice and clear, and very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For my daughter. She thought they fit and functioned well.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo L.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Held up nice and will use another season
customer_reviews.text: Get the job done for my 9 Year on the slopes ! Affordable and Held up nice and will use another season !
customer_reviews.author: MNMEL

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, fit well! Worked well for my first time skier!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Holt

customer_reviews.title: ... haven't used them yet but they appear to be good.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used them yet but they appear to be good.
customer_reviews.author: D Ziemer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect goggles!
customer_reviews.text: Loves the pinkish color on the mountain! Kept the sun at a minimum and my face warm!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren P

customer_reviews.title: Great for skiing!
customer_reviews.text: Took these on my ski trip this past weekend and they worked great! Kept the sun toned down and so I could see in the bright snow and it fit well and snug on my face keeping the fog and moisture out.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Broadbent

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: Love these goggles. They only fogged once during 7 hours of boarding. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tint for sunny and cloudy conditions
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tint for sunny and cloudy conditions. NO Fogging at all! My wife loved them. Fit great with her helmet too.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Grist

customer_reviews.title: I like the look of these and they worked well on ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of these and they worked well on the slopes but the foam that contacts your face was scratchy and made my face itchy all day. I wish I had picked another pair instead.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: They are great!
customer_reviews.text: Just got thse today. Used them to while snow blowing my driveway. They are great!
customer_reviews.author: Melody N.

customer_reviews.title: No carrying case!
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are great! I wore them on a bright sunny day and they were wonderful for sun/snow glare. My only problem, is that they did not come with a soft drawstring carrying case!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good at low light
customer_reviews.text: Great for low visibility days on the mountain works great for n8ght ski or heavy for to see terrain of the snow
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these goggles. They look nice and fit great. I recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: corse foam that made my face itch
customer_reviews.text: Product description said nothing about the foam part that touches the face - which is a very important component. Turned out this was very corse foam that made my face itch. I couldn't wear it for more than a minute. Returned for a refund. Refund process was well handled, and quick.
customer_reviews.author: Flores

customer_reviews.title: have a vermillon tint which is perfect for the snow
customer_reviews.text: The googles are well made, have a vermillon tint which is perfect for the snow. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Will be buying again! These are great. Never fogged up and kept the wind out. Very breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles performed excellently and price is unbeatable
customer_reviews.text: Great goggles worked perfectly on both cloudy and sunny days. At first they did seem to put some undue pressure on sinus areas. After the third day as the goggles formed to my face more this has become less and less of an issue. I would recommend an adult large for most medium to large heads.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Mussen

customer_reviews.title: great goggles. The nose area could be a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: great goggles. The nose area could be a bit better fitted, but I know my head is on the smaller side for women.
customer_reviews.author: viagap

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME GOGGLES! USED 3 times and have been flawless thus far.
customer_reviews.author: kenslapalot

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loved them.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my snowboarding son for Christmas snd he was over the moon. Absolutely loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Ventilates beautifully, and gives a clear view as I'm going down the mountain. A++
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of ski googles!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the googles. He wears them while shoveling! They are very comfortable and light weight. It was a great Christmas present and the price was very reasonable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work well with helmet
customer_reviews.text: These were ok. They were cheaper than expected and didn't fit well with my helmet--I will keep them as a back up set.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wegner

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Lasted the first ski season. Will use for a second season. Daughter very happy with fit and comfort!
customer_reviews.author: James Malone

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of 2015
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase of 2015. I hate the wind and snow. They didn't fit as well over my glasses as I had hoped, but it was manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, recommended
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for myself and my boyfriend for our snowboarding trip. Good quality, recommended!
customer_reviews.author: YMX

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable product
customer_reviews.text: Great affordable product and the quality is decent. It fits and I have no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherihan Essam El-Nemr

customer_reviews.title: Good quality goggles. Nice look
customer_reviews.text: Good quality goggles. Don't fog up, even when I'm sweaty. Visibility good, even in the dark with the vermillion lens. Cute look.
customer_reviews.author: Cathee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the money - comfortable fit, tinting is nice, protects from cold and wind.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described right away and product did well. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my daughter to take on a ski trip ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter to take on a ski trip she is 23 yrs old but they are huge on her face. She still loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy G.

customer_reviews.title: comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Wore for skiing multiple times this ski season. Reduces glare from sun reflected on snow, comfortable to wear, and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shira

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic goggles for the price! I didn't experience any fogging.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for snowboarding, no problem with fogging on the runs
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 Miracles

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles for great price
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and stylish goggles for a great price. Used them for my ski trip to Breckenridge last month and the red lenses definitely help you see against the white snow.
customer_reviews.author: Jerf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great goggles been using bolle's for years in my opinion there's nothing better!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason G

product_meta.title: Bolle Mojo Shiny White Vermillon
product_meta.description: Great vision, great comfort, equipped with an anti-fog lens, freeze will be your best companion all day long.
feature_bullets: Classic, medium-to-large-fit goggle offers throwback styling with an advanced lens technology for excellent optical clarity and fog-free performance
Flow-tech venting designed to reduce fogging and optimize flow of air over inside of lens; Venting ports control airflow, while preventing clogging from snow and ice
Unique double lens design creates thermal barrier while providing clear optics and superior seal
P80 Plus/Carbo Glas (anti-fog/anti-scratch) coating provides protection against unwanted lens fogging and most scratching

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
